Welcome to the SRC Source Lab.



Led by Taejune Park the SRC (Secure and Reliable Computing) laboratory at Chonnam National University focuses on network and system security. In particular, we are currently focusing on research challenges including, but not limited to: (1) cloud computing security (e.g., SDN/NFV), (2) high-performance security system, and (3) reliable 'low-latency' communication. Also, we are going to study on innovative AI-based security systems as well :)

Are you interested in joining our laboratory? Join us! >>

2022-03-01
Prof. Park was selected for the Young Scientist Grants/Outstanding Track of National Research Foundation (2022-2026)!
2021-12-17
Ayoung Kim joined our lab! Welcome!
2021-11-05
Our paper conducted with KAIST, entitled "eBPF/XDP-based high-performance packet payload inspection system for container environments", received the Best Paper Award at the KIISC!
2021-10-05
Our study conducted with KAIST won the award at the 2021 Cybersecurity Paper Contest of KIISC!
2021-09-01
A paper, entitled "Real-time Reconfigurable Hardware Architecture for Regular Expression Matching in DPI", has been accepted to the Annual Computer Security Applications Conference (ACSAC) 2021. [Link]
